data.message: Is there such a thing as a "Lottery Attendant" job position at FB? Someone requested to be a friend and claims to be a lottery attendant for FB. Any response to this inquiry?

replies.message: Hi Susan. This sounds like a hoax. Please refrain from sharing your personal information with people you don't know. To learn more about suspicious emails and notifications, visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1QW21Vm. Thanks. -Azaria

Facebook you are here advicing against what you yourself are asking people to do (sending you id like pasports, driving liscences, etc. I.e i don't know you either, and wouldn't have any idea where that information ends up, even thoguh you are saying it gets deleted. So...no thank you.
